reviews.review_msg: Good prof. learned much and very well related cmpt125 to 225
I took his cmpt125 java class! His exams are relatively easy. He follows the textbook very well. He is very generous on grading.
A very good instructor!! definitely recommended!

If you've done at least a bit of VB, you'll find this course easy. It's intended for non-computing students and assumes no prior computing knowledge. I was actually somewhat surprised at getting an A+, but I think the class was scaled (to make it fair, as many computing majors took the course). Final exam average was over 100%.
